item.title: Salmon Pokebowl
item.description: Poke bowl servings: 2 cook time: 25 minutes Ingredients: kewpie mayo..............3 tbsp mini cucumbers...........2 pepper rice vinegar.............1 tsp salmon...................1/4-1/2 pound salt scallions seaweed sesame seeds siracha..................1 tbsp soy sauce................1 tbsp sushi rice...............2 cups garlic chili sauce.......2 cups Cookware: Rice cooker Pan Chopsticks Steps: Start cooking sushi rice in rice cooker sushi rice: 2 cups Cut mini cucumbers into thin slices, put into bowl and splash with rice vinegar, siracha, soy sauce.

item.title: Buffalo Chicken Cups
item.description: Buffalo Chicken Cups Servings: 1 Cook Time: 20 minutes Prep Time: 20 minutes Ingredients Shredded chicken.............. 12oz Softened cream cheese......... 8oz Ranch dressing................ 1/2 cup Buffalo wing sauce............ 1/cup Shredded cheddar cheese....... 1 cup Wonton wrappers............... 24 Blue cheese crumbles.......... 1/2 cup Steps Preheat oven to 375 degrees and spray muffin tins with cooking spray In a medium bowl, combine chicken, cream cheese, ranch, wing sauce and Â¾ cup of cheddar cheese.

item.title: Zaxbys Kickn' Chicken
item.description: Kickin’ Chicken Servings: 1 Cook Time: 20 minutes Ingredients High Temp oil.........Enough to cover pan Chicken...............1 Breast (Cut thin) Ranch.................To taste Buffalo Sauce.........To taste Flour.................1/3 Cup Bread.................2 Slices Steps Coat chicken breast in flour Preheat oven to 400 (only if chicken breast is thick) Put enough oil in pan to mostly cover chicken breast Slowly place chicken in oil Cook on each side for 3 minutes or until golden and crispy Place in oven until chicken is fully cooked through.
